about.title: Medi7: The New Standard for Global Medical Tourism
about.description1: Medi7 is a global medical tourism platform that promotes Korea's excellent medical professionals and facilities worldwide while providing safe and reliable medical services to international patients.
about.description2: As an integrated solution created through collaboration between medical tourism experts and IT professionals, we provide one-stop management from hospital patient recruitment to the entire patient journey. All procedures comply with government regulations and operate transparently.
